pageContext.claim: “So we're in no rush. A lot of the media would like to say, 'Oh, what's going on? Speed, speed, speed.' No rush whatsoever. We are going to have our meeting; we'll see what happens. And I think, ultimately, we're going to be very, very successful.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump has it backwards. Few in the media or the national security sphere are suggesting Trump is going too slow with North Korea. Instead, the concern is that he is going too fast, relieving pressure on North Korea without receiving much in return.
